class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Application required. Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) and application form will be available on the Creative Writing Program website in MID-OCTOBER: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html


Students must attend the first class to be enrolled in this workshop.


Pre-requisite: ENGCW 370RW, Intermediate Fiction (with a final grade of A- or A)
Writing sample required: 5-10 pages of fiction (double-spaced) is required if English is not your first language
course_description: Spring semester. Admittance by assessment of readiness for advanced work by intermediate level instructor in genre. Intensive workshop in the writing of fiction for advanced students. May be repeated for a maximum of eight hours credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 4094, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: T. Cooper, Status: Open
